name: COVID_19AntibodySubstanceInLabResults
title: COVID_19 (Antibody Substance in Lab Results)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains substances relevant for reporting SARS_CoV_2 antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Substance names reported in laboratory results.),(Inclusion Criteria: SARS coronavirus 2 antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
